author: CNET
description: This wireless mic may be tiny but it's mighty too. The BOYA mini weighs just 5 grams featuring noise cancellation, a transmission range of up to 100m, a 30hr battery life and more. Let's unbox the pack that comes with lightning and USB-C compatibility, and hear how it sounds. #boya #wirelessmicrophone #tech #boyamini #lavaliermic #unboxing #videocreator #audio
title: This Tiny Wireless Mic Weighs 5 Grams: Unboxing the $55 BOYA Mini
